# Smith Ave Insights

Smith Ave Insights (Smith Street Marketing) is a consulting and software development company. We provide custom software development, cloud architecture (AWS), data analysis, business intelligence, and digital strategy services.

## Main pages
- Home: https://smithaveinsights.com/
- Company: https://smithaveinsights.com/company
- Portfolio: https://smithaveinsights.com/portfolio
- How We Work: https://smithaveinsights.com/how-we-work
- Blog: https://smithaveinsights.com/blog
- Demo / Contact: https://smithaveinsights.com/demo
- Support: https://smithaveinsights.com/support
- Accessibility: https://smithaveinsights.com/accessibility
- Privacy: https://smithaveinsights.com/privacy

## Portfolio / case studies
- Ascent Pharmaceuticals Landing: https://smithaveinsights.com/ascent-pharmaceuticals-landing
- Construction Dashboard: https://smithaveinsights.com/construction-dashboard
- Real Estate Dashboard: https://smithaveinsights.com/real-estate-dashboard
- Security Scheduling Dashboard: https://smithaveinsights.com/security-scheduling-dashboard
- Tax Company Dashboard: https://smithaveinsights.com/tax-company-dashboard
- Shopify Profit Recovery: https://smithaveinsights.com/shopify-profit-recovery

## Contact
For business inquiries, use the demo/contact form at https://smithaveinsights.com/demo
